geoPoint.title: Geo point
geoPoint.description: Enter latitude and longitude separated by a comma without spaces, e.g. 41.40338,2.17403

catalog.title: Physical catalog
catalog.description: A physical catalog is an online list of products or services a company offers. Products can be grouped into categories or be part of the catalog without belonging to any category

virtual-catalog.title: Virtual catalog
virtual-catalog.description: A virtual catalog is built from one or more physical catalogs. They are used to display products by pulling together items from different physical catalogs

labels.note: Drag and drop to control the order. First active element becomes the default language

categories-items-list.title: Categories and items
categories-items-list.subtitle: Browsing {{name}}
categories-items-list.title-mapping: Choose categories and items for mapping
categories-items-list.subtitle-mapping: Creating a link within your virtual catalog

descr.title-mapping: It is mapped to this virtual location

validations.code: Code cannot contain the following characters: $+;=%{}[]|@~!^*&()?'<>

categories-items-add.title: New category item
categories-items-add.subtitle: Choose new item type

category.title: Category
category.description: This is a container for other categories, products, or variations

link.title: Link
link.description: Link to a physical category or product

physical-product.title: Physical product
physical-product.description: This is a tangible item that can be purchased. It requires physical shipping and can be used for targeted promotions

digital-product.title: Digital product
digital-product.description: This is an intangible item available for purchase. It can be downloaded directly after purchase, meaning it does not require physical shipping. Digital products are also suitable for targeted promotions

bill-of-materials-product.title: Product with bill of materials
bill-of-materials-product.description: This is a physical product that comes with a bill of materials (a list of additional items). It can be used for specific promotions and requires physical shipping

categories-items-add.catalog-item-description: This is a central point for managing your store merchandise and creating catalogs for brans, product lines, or particular suppliers
categories-items-add.virtual-catalog-item-description: A virtual catalog is built from one or more physical catalogs. They are used to display products by pulling together items from different physical catalogs

labels.new-dictionary-property-caution: You can manage dictionary items only after you save the property

descriptions.character-limit: Specify a minimum and/or maximum allowed number of characters
descriptions.pattern: Make this field match a pattern, such as email address, URL, or a custom regular expression. For example: ^[a-z]{6,15}$

validations.maxLength: This field must not contain more than {{max}} characters
validations.minLenght: This field must contain at least {{min}} characters
validations.pattern: This field does not match the selected pattern

labels.duplicate-property-in-product: The property named {{propertyName}} already exists in {{categoryName}}. The name must be unique
labels.duplicate-property-in-catalog: The property named {{propertyName}} already exists at the root catalog. The name must be unique
labels.duplicate-property-in-variation1: The property named {{propertyName}} already exists for this variation
labels.property-naming-error: The property name must start with an alphanumeric character and contain only Latin characters, digits and underscores (_). If an underscore (_) is used, make sure there is an alphanumeric character before and after it

catalogs-select.title: Select catalog
catalogs-select.subtitle: Creating a link within your virtual catalog

labels.priority-description: The lowest value will be used first

validations.sku: SKU cannot contain the following characters: $+;=%{}[]|@~!^*&()?'<>

descr.start-date: If you do not specify a start date, the product will become active immediately as soon as you save it
descr.end-date: If you do not specify an end date, the product will remain active until you deactivate it

labels.name: Name
labels.drag-drop-comment: Drag and drop your images here
labels.make-default-image: Drag and drop an image into the upper left corner of the image area to set it as the default

descr.external-link: Use an external image URL instead of uploading it to assets
descr.external-link-warning: Note: For security reasons, only https links are allowed

labels.no-apikey: You have not provided any Google API key in the platform configuration file. The video information will be incomplete

labels.drag-drop-comment: Drag and drop your files here
labels.name: Name

labels.sorting-prompt: Set how the associated items will appear in the web store. Drag and drop the products to change their order
labels.name: Name

size.label: Aggregation size
size.description: Maximum number of aggregation values in search results. 0 = unlimited

values-Attribute.label: Allowed values
values-Attribute.description: Enter aggregation values allowed in search results. Leave this blank to allow all values

values-Range.label: Range bounds
values-Range.description: Bounds will be sorted automatically before saving. Ranges are constructed as follows: Under [bound 1], [bound 1] to [bound 2], ... , Over [bound N]

values-PriceRange.label: Price range bounds
values-PriceRange.description: Bounds will be sorted automatically before saving. Price ranges are constructed as follows: Under [bound 1], [bound 1] to [bound 2], ... , Over [bound N]
